Name: Edge Application Server Configuration
Description1: This is used for UE to obtain information about suitable Edge Application Server in Edge Data Network, and to support service continuity for the UE to minimize service interruption.

Name: Application Client ID
Description: Identity of the Application Client used to distinguish multiple ACs if applicable, refer to [3GPP TS 23.558].

Name: EAS ID
Description: The identifier of the Edge Application Server, refer to [3GPP TS 23.558].

Name: EAS Endpoint
Description: The endpoint information (e.g. URI, FQDN, IP address) used to communicate with the Edge Application Server, refer to [3GPP TS 23.558].

Name: Type
Description:
Type of EAS that may be useful in service continuity scenario. UE may switch from source EAS (S-EAS) to target EAS (T-EAS) during mobility.
1: S-EAS
2: T-EAS
refer to [3GPP TS 23.558]
